pullRequest.title: Convert Attribute editor to JavaFx pane and use TopComponent framework
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description of the Change
Add final modifiers
convert swing panel to pane
switch over to top component framework for graph listeners

Alternate Designs
N/A

Why Should This Be In Core?
Code consistency

Benefits
Code consistency

Possible Drawbacks
None realized

Verification Process
Open/close - state testing between graphs.

Applicable Issues
#332

nodes.bodyText: Again, this should be handled by the framework.

This should be handled by the framework - it'll automatically apply the default stylesheet, and additionally apply a stylesheet specified by JavaFxTopComponent.createStyle. These styles will cascade down from the top component to its children (at least that's how it's supposed to work.
